Package clientBounderiesReaderAccount

Class MyBorrowsAndReservesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientBounderiesReaderAccount.MyBorrowsAndReservesController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGUIController
    public class MyBorrowsAndReservesController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGUIController
    This class is the controller class for the window of 'borrows and reserves' of the reader account same window will be displayed for both reader account, librarian and library director
